segments.text: Over there, on the left, the children are up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ah, I see it now, a jar clearly labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside, pulling out those sweet treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, looking up with such eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand out, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a perfect little team of cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite clever, how they're doing it so quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mother has no idea what's happening behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thrill of a stolen cookie must be immense for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're risking a lot for a simple snack, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But their faces are alight with shared mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those forbidden cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic scene of childhood rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR
